item.title: Sending email with Mailgun
item.description:
Description

Sending a single email is easy. Sending thousands, not so much. Join me to learn how to leverage the Mailgun API to send email from your Python applications.
item.dc:creator: Douglas Mendizábal

item.title: Snake charming with pyenv
item.description:
Description

In this talk we'll discuss how to use pyenv to manage multiple versions of python to allow you to develop and test your code in Python 2, Python 3, pypy, etc.
item.dc:creator: Douglas Mendizábal
